articles.title: Great Ocean Road clean - up begins after deluge
articles.summary: The Lorne caravan park will be closed for weeks after record-breaking rains turned into 'terrifying' floodwaters, sweeping cars into the ocean and inundating holiday parks along Victoria's Great Ocean Road. Credits Alex Barwick, Presenter Natasha Schapova, Reporter Image Details Flash flooding caused damage between Kennett River and Lorne along the Great Ocean Road on Thursday. ( Supplied ) Program: More from Australia Wide Get the ABC listen app

articles.title: South Africa : Sanparks Suspends Day Visitors Due to Heavy Rain
articles.summary: The South African National Parks (SANParks) has taken a precautionary decision not to allow day visitors into the Kruger National Park due to persistent and heavy rainfall affecting the Limpopo and Mpumalanga provinces. Earlier this week, the park was faced with a challenging situation in which several day visitors were unable to exit the park after a bridge at Crocodile Bridge Gate was covered by water because of rising river levels.
